name: Knight in Shining Armor
prereq: Knight Vigilant; Expert In Light Armor, Medium Armor, Or Unarmored Defense; Trained In Heavy Armor
summary: As a knight in shining armor, you train daily in the heaviest armor, expanding your expertise to heavy armor.
description:
As a knight in shining armor, you train daily in the heaviest armor, expanding your expertise to heavy armor. You gain expert proficiency in heavy armor.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
